welcome_message_body: "Welcome to McPherson, where the charm of small-town America meets modern conveniences. Enjoy our friendly community, explore our historic downtown, and indulge in our famous local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hutchinson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hutchinson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at City-County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at City-County Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salina Airport serves all commercial flights and provides amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Salina Airport serves private and charter flights, with a lounge and facilities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
